actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to abolish the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries.

summary.text: Abolishes the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries established pursuant to the Federal Salary Act, and the provisions of law providing for such commission to adjust the rates of pay of such branches of the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to abolish the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries.
